long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily enable embedding of web content by removing restrictive headers, such as x-frame-options and content-security-policy, from specific websites. This extension modifies response headers to allow seamless integration of otherwise restricted content into iframes or embedded elements. Ideal for developers, educators, and professionals who need to interact with web content across different platforms, the extension ensures functionality while respecting user-defined permissions. It operates locally, only on the websites you specify, and does not collect or share any personal data, ensuring both usability and privacy.
